text.text_translated:
Asteroids are big rocks in space.
Now NASA makes a list of smaller ones.
These are 140 metres wide or more.
People who study space think there are about 25,000.
Now NASA knows about 8,000.
17,000 are still not on the list.
In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded over Chelyabinsk, Russia.
It hurt 1,200 people.
So, these middle-sized asteroids are a serious danger.
They can hurt us because they come near Earth.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Asteroids are big rocks in space.
Now NASA is making a list of smaller ones.
These are 140 metres wide or more.
Scientists think there are about 25,000 of them.
Now NASA knows about 8,000.
17,000 are still not on the list.
In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded over Chelyabinsk, Russia.
It hurt 1,200 people.
So, these middle-sized asteroids are a serious danger.
They can hurt us if they come near Earth.
